product.name: 62 Inch Ceiling Fans No Light with Remote, Modern Ceiling Fan Without Light, Dual Finish 8 Blades, Reversible Quiet DC Motor, 6 Speed, Large Ceiling Fan for Indoor or Covered Outdoor, Black
product.bullet_points:
• Large and Modern Ceiling Fan: Our 62 inch ceiling fan no light has black and walnut double-sided fan blade. Dual finish 8 blades, 6-speed, 1/2/4H timer setting and convenient remote control
• Reversible DC Motor and 6-Speed: Efficient fan motor allows you to enjoy different feelings in summer and winter. And 6-speed variable fan speed can effectively increase air circulation. Our black ceiling fans noise are less than 35dB
• Remote Control and Timer Function: Our ceiling fans no lights with remote is easy to operate and comes with a wall mounting bracket. You can also set the remote control to mute and choose different functions at will: reversible mode, 1/2/4H timer, adjustable speed, etc
• Simple Installation for Indoor/Outdoor: Our farmhouse ceiling fans can choose three pole length (with 5"/10"/15" downrobs) according to your home environment. Moreover,15° sloped ceilings can also be installed. Suitable for indoor or covered outdoor use ( living room, patio, hall, porch)
• 2-Year Customer Support: We also attach great importance to the customer's user experience. Our outdoor ceiling fan no light offer a 2-year after-sales support. If you encounter problems when purchasing, please tell us and we will work with you to solve the problem
